package.name: AudioMix同时播放-Rootless
package.shortDescription: Tweak to play two or more audio sources simultaneously. Doesn't work well with all apps! Sometimes the first audio still gets paused, so you will have to start it again.调整以同时播放两个或多个音频源。不适用于所有应用程序！有时第一个音频仍然会暂停，所以你必须重新启动它。源主测试，不是什么软件都有用，不用反馈！

descriptionlist.description: Tweak to play two or more audio sources simultaneously. Doesn't work well with all apps! Sometimes the first audio still gets paused, so you will have to start it again.调整以同时播放两个或多个音频源。不适用于所有应用程序！有时第一个音频仍然会暂停，所以你必须重新启动它。源主测试，不是什么软件都有用，不用反馈！
